The '''Brown Bird Troop Leader''' is the leader/manager of [[Sarah Tuttle]]'s girl scout team in "[[The One Where Rachel Quits]]". She was portrayed by [[Romy Rosemont]].

After [[Ross Geller|Ross]] accidentally breaks the leg of a girl scout called [[Sarah Tuttle]], he sells the cookies in her place in the hope of winning her the first prize trip to Space Camp. He participates in a reunion with the Brown Birds Troop Leader where the girls and Ross (bidding for Sarah) detail their cookie sales. At the penultimate moment Ross buys a large number of cookies himself. He is ousted, however, by girls who have sold hundreds of boxes of cookies.
